# About Me
<hr>
I am a recent postgraduate from the University of Glasgow and studied 'Research Methods of Psychological Science' in [Institute of Neuroscience and Psychology](http://www.gla.ac.uk/researchinstitutes/neurosciencepsychology/).
My supervisors were [Dr. Domenica Veniero](https://www.gla.ac.uk/researchinstitutes/neurosciencepsychology/staff/domenicaveniero/) and [Prof. Gregor Thut](https://www.gla.ac.uk/researchinstitutes/neurosciencepsychology/staff/gregorthut/).

# Education
<hr>
* Sep 2017 - Sep 2018, M.Sc. Research Methods of Psychological Science, University of Glasgow
* Sep 2012 - Jun 2016, M.A. Psychology, University of Glasgow

# Experience
<hr>
Having completed my undergraduate and postgraduate studies I hope to continue a career in research by undertaking a PhD sometime in the near future. At the moment I am residing in Germany and hope to apply my statistical and experimental methods knowledge in the field Data Science.
